summary: In the English village of Midwich, the blonde-haired, glowing-eyed children of uncertain paternity prove to have frightening powers.
cast: George Sanders|Barbara Shelley|Michael Gwynn|Laurence Naismith|John Phillips|Richard Vernon|Jenny Laird|Thomas Heathcote|Martin Stephens|Richard Warner|Sarah Long|Charlotte Mitchell|Pamela Buck|Rosamund Greenwood|Susan Richards|Bernard Archard|Peter Vaughan|John Stuart|Keith Pyott|Alexander Archdale|Sheila Robins|Tom Bowman|Anthony Harrison|Diane Aubrey|Gerald Paris|Bruno|June Cowell|Linda Bateson|John Kelly|Carlo Cura|Lesley Scoble|Mark Mileham|Roger Malik|Elizabeth Munden|Peter Preidel|Teri Scoble|Peter Taylor|Howard Knight|Brian Smith|Janice Hawley|Paul Norman|Robert Marks|John Bush|Billy Lawrence|John Adams|Chris Adcock|Jack Armstrong|Wallace Bosco|George Curtis|Helen Ford|Denis Gilmore|Olive Gregg|Aidan Harrington|Mary Maxfield|Colin McKenzie|Clive Powell|Arnold Schulkes|Jack Silk|John Timberlake|June West
title: El pueblo de los malditos
